title: Figure, "Turkmenian Man Writing", ca. 1930
markings: underside: Dmitrov mark stamped in orange; 1776 incised in clay.
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Man dressed in tall black hat, red jacket, ornamented boots, sitting cross-legged, holding paper/tablet while writing on it; rectangular base with floral decoration upon which he sits.

tombstone.epitaph:
Figure, "Turkmenian Man Writing", ca. 1930.
ca. 1930. Porcelain (bisque), enamel. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-158.
